mapper.select: select sc.id, u.username stuName, c.course_name courseName, objective_one_usual objectiveOneUsual, objective_one_experiment objectiveOneExperiment, objective_one_final objectiveOneFinal, objective_one_grade objectiveOneGrade, objective_two_usual objectiveTwoUsual, objective_two_experiment objectiveTwoExperiment, objective_two_final objectiveTwoFinal, objective_two_grade objectiveTwoGrade, objective_three_usual objectiveThreeUsual, objective_three_experiment objectiveThreeExperiment, objective_three_final objectiveThreeFinal, objective_three_grade objectiveThreeGrade, usual_grade usualGrade, experiment_grade experimentGrade, final_grade finalGrade, total_grade totalGrade from student_course sc left join `user` u on u.id = sc.stu_id left join course c on c.id = sc.course_id where course_id = (select id from course where course_name =#{param.name} and semester = #{param.semesterId} and c.stu_class_id = #{param.classId})

select sc.id id , c.course_name courseName, c.course_no courseNo, t.name courseType, se.name semester, c.credit, sc.total_grade totalGrade from student_course sc left join course c on sc.course_id = c.id left join type t on t.id = c.course_type_id left join semester se on se.id = c.semester where sc.stu_id = #{userId}

select sc.id,objective_one_grade,objective_two_grade,objective_three_grade from student_course sc left join `user` u on u.id = sc.stu_id left join course c on c.id = sc.course_id where course_id = (select id from course where course_name =#{param.name} and semester = #{param.semesterId} and c.stu_class_id = #{param.classId})
